segments.text: I'm starving . Let's go grab a bite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? That place is too ritzy for lunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: True . ok Let's go to Grumose ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Same thing , meals there all coarsen arm and leg .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess it is a little pricy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's stop it at Multicolor for a quick lunch ..
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be Ok . Come on , I can't wait to chow down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That was a great lunch , the food was good , but the service was lousy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that why you stiffed the waiter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You got it . All right , Let's go back to school .
segments.speaker: S1
